title: The BEST of CES 2020
description: Thanks to Amazon for sponsoring this video! MORE of our CES videos here  The TINY Razer Tomahawk:  a 360 FPS ROG monitor:  AMD's Ryzen is a HUGE step forward for 2020:  The ridiculous PC with a full PS4 Pro built in:   My walkthrough of the Toyota Woven City:  The 4K 160Hz LG UltraGear 27GN950:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
